email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the freight rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a significant adjustment. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We can agree to $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains October 15-20. The demurrage rate is acceptable. Please confirm the vessel details and send over the recap. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Recap
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear we’re aligned. Here’s the recap: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Rotterdam, Discharge Port: Singapore. Laycan: October 15-20. Freight Rate: $50.00/MT. Demurrage: $15,000/day. Please confirm if everything looks good. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Recap
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party
email_chain.body: Hi John, attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah
